Methods

| Edit this page View Source

ToggleVerboseErrors(ulong, bool?)

Toggles the verbose error functionality for a guild, allowing users to enable or disable detailed command errors.

Declaration
public Task<bool> ToggleVerboseErrors(ulong guildId, bool? enabled = null)
Parameters
Type Name Description
ulong guildId

The ID of the guild to toggle verbose errors for.
bool? enabled

Optionally specifies whether to enable or disable verbose errors. If null, toggles the current state.
Returns
Type Description
Task<bool>

True if verbose errors are enabled after the operation; otherwise, false.
